'''Random Events''' and randomly occurring [[World Quest]]s are random encounters that the player can run into while roaming around the world of [[Teyvat]]. Upon completion, the player will gain a random amount of rewards based on [[region]] and [[World Level]].

Straying too far from the encounter or failing to interact with it after a certain amount of time{{verify|How much?}} will cause the Random Event or World Quest to disappear.

Random Events and Random World Quests can be spawned reliably by logging out near one of their starting locations, then logging in again. This should trigger a Random Event or World Quest in the vicinity as the game loads the area surrounding the player.

==Rewards==
The player can gain rewards from Random Events and Random World Quests up to 10 times per day. [[Companionship EXP]] varies based on the area the reward was completed in and is doubled during [[Co-Op Mode]] with at least two or more players.
* {{Item|Companionship EXP|20|x=10–15}}
* {{Item|Mora|20|x=1055–1936}}<!--WL4:1905-->
* {{Item|Fine Enhancement Ore|20|x=0–2}}<!--WL3?-->
* {{Item|Mystic Enhancement Ore|20|x=0–2}}<!--WL3?-->

==Random World Quests==
{{main|World Quests}}
Certain World Quests have a chance of randomly occurring while exploring. When activated, a new quest pop-up will appear on the left side of the screen, which players can then navigate to. It will also appear at the bottom of the World Quest list in the Quest menu.

There are no Random World Quests in Liyue.
